alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 12:55PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA...NORTHEASTERN ALBANY...NORTHERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 1254 PM MST...A snow squall was along Interstate 25 between Douglas and Wheatland. HAZARD...Strong winds in excess of 45 mph and visibilities less than one half mile. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Guernsey, Glendo, Esterbrook Campground, Sibley Peak, Guernsey Campground, Glendo Reservoir, Two Moon Campground, Harris Park, Esterbrook, Hartville and Lost Springs. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range
